prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a jelly-like body and long tentacles.
I want a blue aquatic creature that has red accents and resembles a jellyfish.
Generate a Pokemon that floats gracefully in water with a translucent appearance.
Make a creature inspired by marine life, featuring tentacles and a round head.
Imagine a Pokemon that lives in the ocean and has a unique jellyfish design.
Design a small blue Pokemon with a squishy body and long, trailing appendages.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of jellyfish and sea creatures.
